TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabel extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示轴的自定义标签。

span.span: Represents a custom label for an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象存储在类中, 该类公开为类的属性。 objects are stored in the class, which is exposed as the property of the class. 如果使用属性指定了自定义标签, 则将自动生成第一个标签行的轴标签。Axis labels for the first label row are automatically generated unless custom labels are specified using the property. 如果沿第一个标签行指定自定义标签, 则不会为整个第一行自动生成轴标签。If you specify a custom label along the first label row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row. 对于第二个标签行, 只能使用自定义标签。Only custom labels may be used for the second label row. 和属性确定标签适用的轴范围。The and properties determine the axis range that the label applies to. 通过使用属性, 可以为自定义轴标签显示网格线和/或刻度线; 此属性指定是否将在标签范围的中间绘制自定义网格线或刻度线。A grid line and/or tick mark can be displayed for a custom axis label by using the property; this property specifies whether a custom grid line or tick mark will be drawn in the middle of the label range.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可用于创建和初始化类的新实例。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 但建议使用`Add` 类中的方法之一来添加自定义标签。However, it is recommended that you use one of the `Add` methods in the class to add custom labels.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签在轴坐标中的开始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning position, in axis coordinates, of the custom label.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示应用标签的轴范围的起点。

span.span: A value that represents the beginning of the axis range that the label is applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定标签应用到的轴范围的起始位置。The property determines the start position of the axis range the label is applied to. 和属性的值之间的差异确定标签文本的显示位置。The difference between the values of the and properties determines where the label text will be displayed. 例如, 假设 X 轴的刻度范围为1到 5 (1、2、3、4、5)。For example, suppose the X-axis has a scale that ranges from 1 to 5 (1, 2 ,3 , 4, 5). 若要在第二个点下显示自定义标签, 请将属性设置为 1.5 , 将属性设置为2.5。In order to display a custom label just underneath the second point, you would set the property to 1.5 and the property to 2.5. 如果-或 (具体取决于相关轴) 设置为值, 则此属性将在设计器中显示为值。 If the - or , depending on the axis in question - is set to a value, then this property will be displayed as a value in the designer. 不应将此属性设置为与属性相同的值。This property should not be set to the same value as the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签的标签标记。

span.span: Gets or sets the label mark for a custom label.

summary.span: 这适用于除第一行以外的行中的标签。

span.span: This applies to labels in rows other than the first row.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定要使用的标签标记的类型（如果有）。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of label mark, if any, to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标签标记仅可用于标记的第二行, 通常用于将标签从第一行组合在一起。Label marks can only be used for the second row of labels, and are usually used to group labels together from the first row. 相关对象的主要刻度线线样式用于标记的线条模式, 例如, AxisX. MajorTickMark. linedashstyle. 属性。The major tick mark's line style of the relevant object is used for the line pattern of the mark, for example, the AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the custom label row.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定自定义标签行的索引（从 0 到 10）。

span.span: An value that specifies the index, 0 to 10, of the custom label row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定行标签的索引, 其中0是最接近该轴的行标签到十个轴标签。The property specifies the index of the row label where zero is the row label closest to the axis to ten, the further most axis label. 只有自定义标签可用于第一行之外的标签行。Only custom labels can be used for the label rows beyond the first row. 如果为第一行使用自定义标签, 则将不会自动生成整个轴的标签;在这种情况下, 第一行的所有标签都必须是自定义标签。If a custom label is used for the first row, labels for that entire axis will not be generated automatically; in this case, all labels for the first row must then be custom labels.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom label text.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标签文本。

span.span: A value that represents the label text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置对象的标签文本。 The property gets or sets the label text of the object. 请注意, 将自动生成第一个标签行的轴标签, 但可以使用对象进行重写。Note that axis labels for the first label row are generated automatically, but can be overridden using objects. 如果沿第一个轴行指定自定义标签, 则将不会为整个第一行自动生成轴标签。If you specify a custom label along the first axis row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row.
